CreatePrefetchTask.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: teo.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreatePrefetchTask
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Targets": [
        "http://www.qq.com/a.txt",
        "www.qq.com/1.txt"
    ],
    "ZoneId": "abc",
    "EncodeUrl": true
}
CreatePrefetchTask.title: 预热URL

CreatePurgeTask.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: teo.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreatePurgeTask
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Targets": [
        "http://www.qq.com/a.txt",
        "www.qq.com/1.txt"
    ],
    "Type": "purge_url",
    "ZoneId": "abc",
    "EncodeUrl": true
}
CreatePurgeTask.title: 清除URL

CreatePurgeTask.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: teo.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreatePurgeTask
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Type": "purge_all",
    "ZoneId": "abc",
    "EncodeUrl": true
}
CreatePurgeTask.title: 清除abc站点下的所有资源

DescribePrefetchTasks.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: teo.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribePrefetchTasks
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ZoneId": "abc",
    "StartTime": "2022-02-09T00:00:00+08:00",
    "EndTime": "2022-02-09T23:59:00+08:00",
    "Statuses": [
        "success"
    ],
    "Limit": 1,
    "Offset": 7,
    "Domains": [
        "www.qq.com"
    ]
}
DescribePrefetchTasks.title: 查询预热任务
